name: Surveillance Series #01 - BIRDS
description: The Surveillance Series is an experiment based on my research about surveillance cameras for the last three years. The cameras were recorded for 26 days, 12 hours a day, between May and June of 2020. I captured one category a day for 26 days. For Hic et Nunc, I chose 6 GIFs, out of the 26 categories. The #01 is BIRDS. City: Bratislava, Slovakia. Lívia Zafanelli. @kijeux ___ 640x480 px, 8 seconds. See my Twitter for more information on this experiment: https://twitter.com/kijeux.
